sentence.Network_cn: 他说得头头是道,但我觉得有些可疑,于是拒绝了他的建议.

entry.tran: 有说服力的；令人信服的
entry.def: Someone or something that is persuasive is likely to persuade a person to believe or do a particular thing.

example.ex: What do you think were some of the more persuasive arguments on the other side?...
example.tran: 你认为对方哪些观点更有说服力？

example.ex: I can be very persuasive when I want to be...
example.tran: 如果我愿意的话，我会非常有说服力的。
